channel.title: Sam Akin Rs3server INtro
channel.description:
small intro about me..
Ive been playing rsps since 2008 and owned a server called rs3server together with acdodo. it was very successful server (500+ players)
i live in brooklyn and i still own rs3server but now we started again. i love every single of my staff member and player... i think thats what made my server grow... i still have many staff member from 2010 playing my server. i joined this to get to know about rsps community and hope to see some of my old friends or players. hit me up if you wanna chill. we can talk about things related to rsps or anything... nice to meet all of you.
